bb.title: Senior Software Engineer - DevOps
bb.description: Responsible for building a multitude of apps and services, using Javascript, Typescript, Java, Python, PHP, React, Kubernetes, GraphQL, Terraform, Groovy, Docker, Jenkins CI/CD, AWS Services (AppSync, EC2, RDS, CDK, Step Functions, Lambda, Glue, Athena, S3, Trusted Advisor, Support, Cloudwatch, AppSync, EventBridge, Parameter Store)

fusion.title: Test Automation Engineer / Team Lead
fusion.description: Responsible for building consulting with different companies and building out test automation frameworks for them.

as.title: Test Automation Engineer
as.description: Responsible for building out test automation frameworks for the team and training other team members.

oa.title: Test Automation Engineer
oa.description: Responsible for building manual testing and building test automation for start-up.
